review: Very experienced and senior doctor. Did consultation with lot of patience. Didn't recommend antibiotics rather treated with simple yet effective medicines. Overall very satisfactory.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Lalitha is great doctor, not only friendly, but she is also extremely kind in ensuring patient is in right frame of mind to understand the situation as it was first point of contact (cricial one) for diagnosis of the disease with her compassionate attitude, especially the courtesy in treating me helped me make understand the most of critical aspects of the disease, she was also candid enough to discuss necessary supplements and made recommendations as to what i need, more often my experience with doctors usually they are in hurry when visiting their patients, here it is quite different and I truly appreciate her dedication and treatment.

The doctor is tremendously experienced and listens to all the problems very carefully. She considers all the aspects of the symptoms *** ******* ********* *********** ********** I would highly encourage and recommend her. Thank you ma'am.

Dr Lalitha Devi, is excellent well behave, down to earth. *** ** *** ** ****** *** Well explanation of the problem, whether to further diagnose or which direction we should proceed....she is SME, subject matter expert. I like her way of treatment the most. Thank you, Dr.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
Firstly i recommend the lalitha devi garu. Why because patient's are very nervous to doctors. 
one day i met the lalitha devi garu. She was treated me like as my mother. And she is speaking very soothingly, she told me how to  take food and careness.
she is having proessionalismm and humanity.she is enjoying her profession.
I heared she is recently came back to india from soudhi.In soudhi so many doctors available. But in india like Lalitha Devi doctors is need for here.
Like these every doctor should treat the patient's. Then automatically half of desease will cure.
And my opinion is she is role model. 
Such a nice persion i met.In my chaild hood i thought i want to be a doctor. But unluckly my poorness not suppoted.If i am the doctor then i will behave like Lalitha Devi garu.And i wish the all the best for your future.you take care about patients, god will take care about you and your family. 
And i will pray for you. 
Thank you lalitha maaa....

Excellent and very friendly doctor. *** ********* ** ****** ****** My doctor Lalitha Devi has been a great help to me for my good health control, took the personal care. I was tensed worrying about the changes in my health. After your consultation and taking treatment and under your guidance, I am happy and slowly recovering from stress. Thank you for your consultation. Doctor listens to our problems carefully, gives suggestions and she treats us mentally than medically, patient always has time to talk about my issues in depth and is open to looking at new ways of dealing with them. Thank u madam making me comfortable about my problem.
Doctor is so friendly. She listened to my problems. She explained the issues clearly. I recommend this doctor.
**** ****** *** very caring and balancing. Very cordial with patients. She has not recommended unnecessary tests, very rare doctor.
Doctor  Lalita was so good . She explained everything very well and prescribed minimum meds . She is a super health counselor üòçüòç
reply_text: Thank you for those sweet words ü§ó
